Stacking","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_imgNetwork_Connections":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/lame_training/soc_network_connections?form.ip=$ip$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d5a35189366bc702e6cd","preserveAspectRatio":true}},"viz_imgDNS_Connections":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/lame_training/soc_dns_traffic_for_an_ip?form.ip=$ip$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d5cf5189366bc702e6ce","preserveAspectRatio":true}},"viz_imgSA_Connections":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/lame_training/soc_remote_system_administration?form.ip=$ip$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d60b5189366bc702e6cf","preserveAspectRatio":true}},"viz_gpDWAuhB":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/lame_training/soc_software_for_an_ip?form.ip=$ip$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d6385189366bc702e6d0","preserveAspectRatio":true}},"viz_imgFileHash":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d6755189366bc702e6d1","preserveAspectRatio":true}},"viz_imgAccountLogin":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d6915189366bc702e6d2"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/lame_training/soc_account_logins?form.ip=$ip$&form.global_time.earliest=$global_time.earliest$&form.global_time.latest=$global_time.latest$","newTab":true}}]},"viz_imgLogStacking":{"type":"splunk.image","eventHandlers":[],"options":{"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6313d6ba5189366bc702e6d3"}},"viz_OCotLkX0":{"type":"splunk.linkgraph","options":{"backgroundColor":"#294e70","nodeWidth":129,"showValueCounts":false},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_xcD5Qx3Z"}},"viz_imgAboutThisDashboard":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/QuestionMark.png"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/log_analysis_made_easy/about_this_dashboard?form.id=$env:page$","newTab":true}}]},"viz_imgSearchForDashboard":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/MagnifyingGlass.png"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/log_analysis_made_easy/find_a_dashboard","newTab":true}}]},"viz_lblAboutThisPage":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## About This Page","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_Cq7mfbY2":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Search For a Dashboard","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_gwXSR8DC":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Account Logins","fontColor":"#ffffff"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_ZdK4UylX":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"eventtype="bro_idx" eventtype="bro_conn" src_ip=* dest_ip=*
| stats count by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port
| rename src_ip as "Source IP" 
| rename dest_ip as "Destination IP"
| rename dest_port as "Port"
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Destination IP" Output location as dest_location
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Source IP" Output location as src_location
| fillnull value="external" src_location, dest_location
| iplocation "Destination IP" 
| fillnull value="N/A" Country"},"name":"ChainSearch_NetworkTraffic"},"ds_xcD5Qx3Z":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ZdK4UylX","query":"$network_direction$"},"name":"Network_Traffic_With_Direction"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"tokens":{"default":{"port":{"value":"*"}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"rt-1m,rt"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_IP":{"options":{"defaultValue":"","token":"ip"},"title":"IP Address","type":"input.text"},"input_location":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"},{"label":"Internal","value":"internal"},{"label":"External","value":"external"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"location"},"title":"Dropdown Input Title","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_V7pBpEEd":{"options":{"defaultValue":"*","token":"port"},"title":"Port","type":"input.text"},"input_IKvb5yHQ":{"options":{"defaultValue":"*","token":"country"},"title":"Country","type":"input.text"},"input_eS6O33EH":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"No Sorting","value":"```MyComment```"},{"label":"Ascending","value":"| sort - count | head 50"},{"label":"Descending","value":"| sort count | head 50"}],"defaultValue":"```MyComment```","token":"sort"},"title":"Sort","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_NetworkDirection":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"Outgoing","value":"| search dest_location = $location$ Port=$port$ "Source IP"="$ip$" Country="$country$" | table "Source IP", "Destination IP", Country Port count"},{"label":"Incoming","value":"| search src_location = $location$ Port=$port$ "Destination IP"="$ip$" Country="$country$" | table "Destination IP", "Source IP", Country Port count"}],"token":"network_direction"},"title":"Network Direction","type":"input.dropdown"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"/static/app/log_analysis_made_easy/Two-tone-blue.png"},"backgroundColor":"#1434A4","showTitleAndDescription":false,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_lblDNSLog","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":97,"w":100,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblRemoteSAConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":50,"y":148,"w":230,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblSoftwareConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":195,"w":210,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblFileHashMatch","type":"block","position":{"x":80,"y":248,"w":180,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":296,"w":160,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblLogStack","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":346,"w":130,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblNetworkConnections","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":45,"w":220,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_imgDNS_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":90,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgSA_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":140,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_gpDWAuhB","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":190,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgFileHash","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":240,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":290,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgLogStacking","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":340,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_OCotLkX0","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":30,"w":880,"h":830}},{"item":"viz_imgNetwork_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":40,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAboutThisDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_imgSearchForDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":1170,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_lblAboutThisPage","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":0,"w":160,"h":44}},{"item":"viz_Cq7mfbY2","type":"block","position":{"x":960,"y":0,"w":220,"h":44}},{"item":"viz_gwXSR8DC","type":"block","position":{"x":540,"y":0,"w":160,"h":44}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_NetworkDirection","input_IP","input_location","input_V7pBpEEd","input_IKvb5yHQ","input_eS6O33EH"]},"description":"","title":"SOC Log Stacking"}
